memberdef.name: hpm_dsp_barycenter_f32

briefdescription.para: Barycenter of the floating-potint type.

simplesect.para: natural logarithm value of the input

detaileddescription.para: This set of functions implements sine, cosine, arctanm, and square root. There are separate functions for Q15, Q31, and floating-point data.
